answers.answer: I just got diagnosed with it. I have high blood pressure and protein on my urine. No symptoms though yet thank goodness. But the symptoms to look for are a head ache that won't go away with Tylenol, pain at the top right of your stomach, and flashes on your vision. Also swelling I believe is one. Also, I'm almost 28 weeks.
I'm 37w n now they think I have it hahah
I'm actually 21weeks 2days alsoIm showing signs of itI see my Dr every 2weeksI'm high risk

I had it severely with my first and was incredibly unwell with massive swelling, bp 170/140, blinded by white spots, headache that wouldn't go and so weak I could barely shower myself. It started at 28wks and I was in and out of hospital under 35wks. This time I have it but mild-moderate. Hypertension, fatigue, blinded by white spots started at 15wks, hospital at 18wks, home now and don't feel too bad so fingers crossed I make it to 36wks.
Thanks for the replies ladies!!! im going to call my doc because i think im having symptoms. Well i wish you all the best and hope everything goes smoothly! :)

I was starting to think I was the only one who had it on this app because I never see anyone talk about it. If you have it I imagine they'll make you come twice a week for monitoring, that's what I have to do. No bed rest yet. Good luck!

question: Hey ladies...i am 21weeks and 2days and i was wondering if any of you have experienced preeclampsia? i would like to know how you felt and what symptoms occurred and how far along you were when you got it.
title: Prreclampsia
